page.title: 05BLENNERHASSET
page.content: I moved to Blennerhasset during the past year. I live in a house called Peare Tree House. It was built in 1686, so next year it will be three hundred years old. I like living here because there is a shop across the road. The school is over the road too. There are lots of things happening in the village, like a Sports Day and an annual fancy dress parade. Lots of mobile shops visit the village, the mobile library and an ice-cream van too. The main disadvantage of living here is that the buses don't run very frequently, only two a day, so it is difficult for old people and those without cars, to go shopping; and for young people to go the the swimming baths, night classes and clubs.
